body_html:
@jhetherly - Sorry, I am very novice in Tensorflow, so I also don't know much about this. Will search the repo, if I find example code, will fix it too.

By the way, I locally implemented gradient propagation in this operation, and made output shape fully defined, when possible. May be it will be interesting to you to look at these changes. I can make PR with them if it worth it. See last 2 commits in
https://github.com/vchigrin/tensorflow/commits/periodic-resample-grad
